content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining and processing at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -82.0)) 
- Furnace (position (41.0, -82.0)) 
- Burner inserter (position (43.5, -80.5)) 
- Wooden chest (position (42.5, -83.5)) 
- Wooden chest (position (44.5, -81.5)) 
- Wooden chest (position (43.5, -79.5)) 
- Wooden chest (position (45.5, -80.5))

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Make sure the entity from which you want to extract items has the items you want to extract.
- Ensure the entity is not out of fuel or resources before attempting to extract items.
### Errors when using burner mining drill
- Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine resources.
- Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to mine resources.
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to insert items.
- Make sure the burner inserter has a valid drop position before attempting to insert items.
